short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts sentiment, tags, concepts and categories from a URL or piece of text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Contextsense is an API to extract and rank concepts, tags and categories from webpages, URLs and text. Determine the sentiment expressed on a webpage. As a demonstration of Wingify's contextual targeting technology, contextually similar links to the input are also fetched from the web.
